## ComponentRedirectRoute() function

Defines redirection route to component's route on which is this decorator applied

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ComponentRedirectRoute(redirectFrom: string, redirectTo?: string, pathMatchFull?: boolean): ClassDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  redirectFrom | string | Path from which should redirection occur |
|  redirectTo | string | Path to which should be redirect performed, if not specified and only one route is defined, its path will be used |
|  pathMatchFull | boolean | Indication that full path match should be used, default is true |

<b>Returns:</b>

ClassDecorator

ClassDecorator
